mapper.select: select comm.weekday,comm.common_activity,gre.great_activity,(comm.common_activity + gre.great_activity) as total_activity from ( -- 常规活动 SELECT a.date,a.weekday,count(b.activity_id) as common_activity from ( SELECT DATE(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1)) as date,'周一' as weekday union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 1 day)),'周二' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 2 day)),'周三' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 3 day)),'周四' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 4 day)),'周五' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 5 day)),'周六' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 6 day)),'周日') a LEFT JOIN (select * from sys_activity a where a.activity_state >= "5" and a.activity_category = "1") b ON DATE_FORMAT(a.date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(b.activity_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY a.date,a.weekday) comm,( SELECT a.date,a.weekday,count(b.activity_id) as great_activity from ( SELECT DATE(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1)) as date,'周一' as weekday union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 1 day)),'周二' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 2 day)),'周三' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 3 day)),'周四' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 4 day)),'周五' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 5 day)),'周六' union all SELECT DATE(DATE_ADD(subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1), interval 6 day)),'周日') a LEFT JOIN (select * from sys_activity a where a.activity_state >= "5" and a.activity_category = "2") b ON DATE_FORMAT(a.date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(b.activity_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY a.date,a.weekday) gre where comm.weekday = gre.weekday

select (select count(DISTINCT st.id) from sys_dept st where st.pid = "38") as club_num, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT u.id) from sys_user u where u.account != 'admin') as user_num, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.activity_id) from sys_activity a where a.activity_state >= "5") as activity_num, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.activity_id) from sys_activity a where a.activity_state >= "5" and a.activity_start_time BETWEEN (select date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY)) and (select date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 6 DAY))) as week_activity_num, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.activity_id) from sys_activity a where a.activity_state >= "5" and a.activity_category = "1" and a.activity_start_time BETWEEN (select date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY)) and (select date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 6 DAY))) as week_common_num, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.activity_id) from sys_activity a where a.activity_state >= "5" and a.activity_category = "2" and a.activity_start_time BETWEEN (select date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY)) and (select date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 6 DAY))) as week_great_num from dual
